text: As it was done in Bug 58865 it would be very useful to be able to set empty value to variable instead of not defining it. Example with the following CSS selector 'a.titi' for the variable myvar And code: test and an http argument as baulpismuth = ${myvar} and the given html the browser will send baulpismuth= but jmeter will send baulpismuth=${myvar} as no match will be found and it's not possible to define an empty default value
creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
